metadata.Plot: Reporter Ernest Hemingway is an ambulance driver in Italy during World War I. While bravely risking his life in the line of duty, he is injured and ends up in the hospital, where he falls in love with his nurse, Agnes von Kurowsky.
metadata.Writer: Henry S. Villard, James Nagel, Allan Scott
metadata.Actors: Sandra Bullock, Chris O'Donnell, Mackenzie Astin
